title: SP Majid inspects newly opened licensing counter at ITP HQ
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 02 (APP):Superintendent of Police (SP) Majid Iqbal visited and inspected the newly established licensing counter at the Islamabad Traffic Police (ITP) Headquarters in Faizabad, set up recently to facilitate citizens with improved licensing services.
An official told APP on Thursday that during the visit, SP Majid Iqbal reviewed the arrangements made for the public at the new facility.
He said Inspector Licensing In-charge Muhammad Shafiq briefed both the SP and citizens about the licensing process and services available at the counter.
He added that citizens expressed their gratitude to Chief Traffic Officer (CTO) Captain (retd) Hamza Humayun for launching the new counter, terming it a positive initiative to reduce waiting time and improve service delivery
